refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: vector returns a new vector (one-dimensional array) constructed from the given arguments.

refsect2.para: Values of any types (not necessarily of one and the same type).

refsect1.title: Return Values
refsect1.para: A vector (heterogeneous array) of as many elements as there were arguments containing copies of the arguments.

example.title: Inspecting a vector with dbg_obj_print
example.para: SQL clients can not process vectors directly so the simplest way to look at the content of a vector is to print it no server's console.

example.title: Pretty-print function for vectors
example.para: The following function gets a heterogeneous vector of strings, nubers and other vectors and returns a string that is an SQL expression that will return a copy of a given vector.
